### Generated by BLACKBOX.AI
https://www.blackbox.ai
### YOU
Maine ak photo resize and convert website banai thi lekin bo kaam nahi kar rahi hai
### BLACKBOX.AI

I'll help you create a working photo resize and conversion website. Let me build a complete solution with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a single file.


1. The user wants a functional photo resizing and conversion website
2. Requirements:
   - Upload functionality
   - Resize options (width/height controls)
   - Format conversion (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
   - Download converted files
3. Need to include:
   - File input for uploading
   - Resize controls
   - Format selection
   - Preview functionality
   - Download button
4. Will use Canvas API for image manipulation
5. Will make it responsive and user-friendly


`photo-resizer.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Photo Resizer & Converter</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        .drop-area {
            border: 2px dashed #ccc;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        .drop-area.active {
            border-color: #4F46E5;
            background-color: #f0f4ff;
        }
        #previewContainer {
            max-width: 100%;
            display: none;
        }
        #downloadBtn {
            display: none;
        }
        .aspect-ratio-btn.active {
            background-color: #4F46E5;
            color: white;
        }
        @media (max-width: 640px) {
            .controls-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50 min-h-screen">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <header class="text-center mb-10">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-indigo-700 mb-2">Photo Resizer & Converter</h1>
            <p class="text-gray-600">Resize and convert your images easily</p>
        </header>

        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md overflow-hidden p-6">
            <div id="dropArea" class="drop-area rounded-lg p-8 text-center cursor-pointer mb-8">
                <img src="https://placehold.co/100x100?text=Click+or+Drag+Image" 
                     alt="Upload icon with cloud symbol and arrow pointing up" 
                     class="mx-auto mb-4">
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" class="hidden" accept="image/*">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">Upload Your Photo</h2>
                <p class="text-gray-500">Click to browse or drag and drop image file</p>
            </div>

            <div id="controls" class="controls-grid grid grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6 hidden">
                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Resize Options</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="width" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Width (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="width" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>
                     
                    <div>
                        <label for="height" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Height (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="height" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>

                    <div class="flex space-x-2">
                        <button id="keepAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn active bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Keep Aspect Ratio</button>
                        <button id="removeAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Custom Size</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Output Settings</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="format" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Output Format</label>
                        <select id="format" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                            <option value="jpeg">JPEG</option>
                            <option value="png">PNG</option>
                            <option value="webp">WebP</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>

                    <div>
                        <label for="quality" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Quality (<span id="qualityValue">85</span>%)</label>
                        <input type="range" id="quality" min="1" max="100" value="85" class="w-full h-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="previewContainer" class="text-center mb-6">
                <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-4">Preview</h3>
                <canvas id="previewCanvas" class="border border-gray-200 rounded-lg max-w-full mx-auto"></canvas>
                <div id="imageInfo" class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500"></div>
            </div>

            <div id="actionButtons" class="flex justify-center gap-4 hidden">
                <button id="resetBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-gray-300">
                    Reset
                </button>
                <button id="downloadBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-indigo-700">
                    Download Image
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <footer class="text-center mt-16 text-gray-500 text-sm">
            <p>Resize and convert your images quickly with this web tool.</p>
        </footer>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const dropArea = document.getElementById('dropArea');
            const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
            const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
            const previewContainer = document.getElementById('previewContainer');
            const previewCanvas = document.getElementById('previewCanvas');
            const imageInfo = document.getElementById('imageInfo');
            const widthInput = document.getElementById('width');
            const heightInput = document.getElementById('height');
            const formatSelect = document.getElementById('format');
            const qualitySlider = document.getElementById('quality');
            const qualityValue = document.getElementById('qualityValue');
            const downloadBtn = document.getElementById('downloadBtn');
            const resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
            const keepAspectBtn = document.getElementById('keepAspectRatio');
            const removeAspectBtn = document.getElementById('removeAspectRatio');
            const actionButtons = document.getElementById('actionButtons');

            let originalImage = null;
            let originalAspectRatio = 1;
            let keepAspectRatio = true;

            // Handle drag and drop events
            dropArea.addEventListener('click', () => fileInput.click());
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.add('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
                if (e.dataTransfer.files.length) {
                    fileInput.files = e.dataTransfer.files;
                    handleFileSelection();
                }
            });

            fileInput.addEventListener('change', handleFileSelection);

            function handleFileSelection() {
                const file = fileInput.files[0];
                if (!file || !file.type.match('image.*')) return;

                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    originalImage = new Image();
                    originalImage.onload = function() {
                        originalAspectRatio = originalImage.width / originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Initialize inputs
                        widthInput.value = originalImage.width;
                        heightInput.value = originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Show controls
                        controls.classList.remove('hidden');
                        previewContainer.style.display = 'block';
                        actionButtons.classList.remove('hidden');
                        
                        // Update preview
                        updatePreview();
                    };
                    originalImage.src = e.target.result;
                };
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }

            // Update preview when inputs change
            [widthInput, heightInput, formatSelect, qualitySlider].forEach(input => {
                input.addEventListener('input', updatePreview);
            });

            qualitySlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
                qualityValue.textContent = qualitySlider.value;
            });

            // Aspect ratio buttons
            keepAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = true;
                this.classList.add('active');
                removeAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
                updatePreview();
            });

            removeAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = false;
                this.classList.add('active');
                keepAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
            });

            // Handle width/height changes while maintaining aspect ratio
            widthInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    heightInput.value = Math.round(widthInput.value / originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            heightInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    widthInput.value = Math.round(heightInput.value * originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            function updatePreview() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const width = parseInt(widthInput.value) || 1;
                const height = parseInt(heightInput.value) || 1;
                
                previewCanvas.width = width;
                previewCanvas.height = height;
                
                const ctx = previewCanvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, width, height);
                
                // Update image info
                const format = formatSelect.value.toUpperCase();
                imageInfo.textContent = `${width} Ã— ${height}px â€¢ ${format} â€¢ ${qualitySlider.value}% quality`;
            }

            // Download button
            downloadBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
                canvas.width = parseInt(widthInput.value);
                canvas.height = parseInt(heightInput.value);
                
                const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
                
                let mimeType;
                switch(formatSelect.value) {
                    case 'jpeg':
                        mimeType = 'image/jpeg';
                        break;
                    case 'png':
                        mimeType = 'image/png';
                        break;
                    case 'webp':
                        mimeType = 'image/webp';
                        break;
                }
                
                const quality = parseInt(qualitySlider.value) / 100;
                const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL(mimeType, quality);
                
                const link = document.createElement('a');
                link.download = `resized-image.${formatSelect.value}`;
                link.href = dataUrl;
                link.click();
            });

            // Reset button
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                fileInput.value = '';
                previewContainer.style.display = 'none';
                controls.classList.add('hidden');
                actionButtons.classList.add('hidden');
                originalImage = null;
                dropArea.classList.remove('hidden');
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```




I've created a complete Photo Resizer & Converter web application with these features:
- Drag and drop or click to upload images
- Resize controls with width/height inputs
- Option to maintain aspect ratio
- Format conversion (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
- Quality slider for output
- Real-time preview
- Download functionality
- Reset option
- Responsive design that works on mobile devices

The UI is clean and user-friendly with visual feedback for all interactions. The JavaScript handles all the image processing using the Canvas API for reliable conversions.


ðŸŽ¨ **Generating images based on descriptions...**

âœ… **Images generated successfully! Here's your updated content:**

`photo-resizer.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Photo Resizer & Converter</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        .drop-area {
            border: 2px dashed #ccc;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        .drop-area.active {
            border-color: #4F46E5;
            background-color: #f0f4ff;
        }
        #previewContainer {
            max-width: 100%;
            display: none;
        }
        #downloadBtn {
            display: none;
        }
        .aspect-ratio-btn.active {
            background-color: #4F46E5;
            color: white;
        }
        @media (max-width: 640px) {
            .controls-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50 min-h-screen">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <header class="text-center mb-10">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-indigo-700 mb-2">Photo Resizer & Converter</h1>
            <p class="text-gray-600">Resize and convert your images easily</p>
        </header>

        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md overflow-hidden p-6">
            <div id="dropArea" class="drop-area rounded-lg p-8 text-center cursor-pointer mb-8">
                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/a0896a0a-3eb3-4e10-b56f-dc10830a52f0.png" 
                     alt="Upload icon with cloud symbol and arrow pointing up" 
                     class="mx-auto mb-4">
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" class="hidden" accept="image/*">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">Upload Your Photo</h2>
                <p class="text-gray-500">Click to browse or drag and drop image file</p>
            </div>

            <div id="controls" class="controls-grid grid grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6 hidden">
                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Resize Options</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="width" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Width (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="width" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>
                     
                    <div>
                        <label for="height" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Height (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="height" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>

                    <div class="flex space-x-2">
                        <button id="keepAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn active bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Keep Aspect Ratio</button>
                        <button id="removeAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Custom Size</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Output Settings</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="format" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Output Format</label>
                        <select id="format" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                            <option value="jpeg">JPEG</option>
                            <option value="png">PNG</option>
                            <option value="webp">WebP</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>

                    <div>
                        <label for="quality" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Quality (<span id="qualityValue">85</span>%)</label>
                        <input type="range" id="quality" min="1" max="100" value="85" class="w-full h-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="previewContainer" class="text-center mb-6">
                <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-4">Preview</h3>
                <canvas id="previewCanvas" class="border border-gray-200 rounded-lg max-w-full mx-auto"></canvas>
                <div id="imageInfo" class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500"></div>
            </div>

            <div id="actionButtons" class="flex justify-center gap-4 hidden">
                <button id="resetBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-gray-300">
                    Reset
                </button>
                <button id="downloadBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-indigo-700">
                    Download Image
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <footer class="text-center mt-16 text-gray-500 text-sm">
            <p>Resize and convert your images quickly with this web tool.</p>
        </footer>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const dropArea = document.getElementById('dropArea');
            const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
            const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
            const previewContainer = document.getElementById('previewContainer');
            const previewCanvas = document.getElementById('previewCanvas');
            const imageInfo = document.getElementById('imageInfo');
            const widthInput = document.getElementById('width');
            const heightInput = document.getElementById('height');
            const formatSelect = document.getElementById('format');
            const qualitySlider = document.getElementById('quality');
            const qualityValue = document.getElementById('qualityValue');
            const downloadBtn = document.getElementById('downloadBtn');
            const resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
            const keepAspectBtn = document.getElementById('keepAspectRatio');
            const removeAspectBtn = document.getElementById('removeAspectRatio');
            const actionButtons = document.getElementById('actionButtons');

            let originalImage = null;
            let originalAspectRatio = 1;
            let keepAspectRatio = true;

            // Handle drag and drop events
            dropArea.addEventListener('click', () => fileInput.click());
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.add('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
                if (e.dataTransfer.files.length) {
                    fileInput.files = e.dataTransfer.files;
                    handleFileSelection();
                }
            });

            fileInput.addEventListener('change', handleFileSelection);

            function handleFileSelection() {
                const file = fileInput.files[0];
                if (!file || !file.type.match('image.*')) return;

                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    originalImage = new Image();
                    originalImage.onload = function() {
                        originalAspectRatio = originalImage.width / originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Initialize inputs
                        widthInput.value = originalImage.width;
                        heightInput.value = originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Show controls
                        controls.classList.remove('hidden');
                        previewContainer.style.display = 'block';
                        actionButtons.classList.remove('hidden');
                        
                        // Update preview
                        updatePreview();
                    };
                    originalImage.src = e.target.result;
                };
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }

            // Update preview when inputs change
            [widthInput, heightInput, formatSelect, qualitySlider].forEach(input => {
                input.addEventListener('input', updatePreview);
            });

            qualitySlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
                qualityValue.textContent = qualitySlider.value;
            });

            // Aspect ratio buttons
            keepAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = true;
                this.classList.add('active');
                removeAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
                updatePreview();
            });

            removeAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = false;
                this.classList.add('active');
                keepAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
            });

            // Handle width/height changes while maintaining aspect ratio
            widthInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    heightInput.value = Math.round(widthInput.value / originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            heightInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    widthInput.value = Math.round(heightInput.value * originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            function updatePreview() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const width = parseInt(widthInput.value) || 1;
                const height = parseInt(heightInput.value) || 1;
                
                previewCanvas.width = width;
                previewCanvas.height = height;
                
                const ctx = previewCanvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, width, height);
                
                // Update image info
                const format = formatSelect.value.toUpperCase();
                imageInfo.textContent = `${width} Ã— ${height}px â€¢ ${format} â€¢ ${qualitySlider.value}% quality`;
            }

            // Download button
            downloadBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
                canvas.width = parseInt(widthInput.value);
                canvas.height = parseInt(heightInput.value);
                
                const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
                
                let mimeType;
                switch(formatSelect.value) {
                    case 'jpeg':
                        mimeType = 'image/jpeg';
                        break;
                    case 'png':
                        mimeType = 'image/png';
                        break;
                    case 'webp':
                        mimeType = 'image/webp';
                        break;
                }
                
                const quality = parseInt(qualitySlider.value) / 100;
                const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL(mimeType, quality);
                
                const link = document.createElement('a');
                link.download = `resized-image.${formatSelect.value}`;
                link.href = dataUrl;
                link.click();
            });

            // Reset button
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                fileInput.value = '';
                previewContainer.style.display = 'none';
                controls.classList.add('hidden');
                actionButtons.classList.add('hidden');
                originalImage = null;
                dropArea.classList.remove('hidden');
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```


### YOU

### BLACKBOX.AI

ðŸ”„ **HTML Edit Mode** - Processing your edit request...

These changes will:
1. Give the app a clear name "ImageTool Pro"
2. Make it more professional sounding
3. Keep all functionality intact
4. Allow you to save it as imagetool.html for easy use in browserHere is the updated HTML content after applying above edits:

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>ImageTool - Photo Resizer & Converter</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        .drop-area {
            border: 2px dashed #ccc;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        .drop-area.active {
            border-color: #4F46E5;
            background-color: #f0f4ff;
        }
        #previewContainer {
            max-width: 100%;
            display: none;
        }
        #downloadBtn {
            display: none;
        }
        .aspect-ratio-btn.active {
            background-color: #4F46E5;
            color: white;
        }
        @media (max-width: 640px) {
            .controls-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50 min-h-screen">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <header class="text-center mb-10">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-indigo-700 mb-2">ImageTool Pro</h1>
            <p class="text-gray-600">Resize, Convert & Optimize Images in Seconds</p>
        </header>

        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md overflow-hidden p-6">
            <div id="dropArea" class="drop-area rounded-lg p-8 text-center cursor-pointer mb-8">
                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/a0896a0a-3eb3-4e10-b56f-dc10830a52f0.png" 
                     alt="Upload icon with cloud symbol and arrow pointing up" 
                     class="mx-auto mb-4">
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" class="hidden" accept="image/*">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2">Upload Your Photo</h2>
                <p class="text-gray-500">Click to browse or drag and drop image file</p>
            </div>

            <div id="controls" class="controls-grid grid grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6 hidden">
                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Resize Options</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="width" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Width (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="width" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>
                     
                    <div>
                        <label for="height" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Height (px)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="height" min="1" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                    </div>

                    <div class="flex space-x-2">
                        <button id="keepAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn active bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Keep Aspect Ratio</button>
                        <button id="removeAspectRatio" class="aspect-ratio-btn bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md">Custom Size</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="space-y-4">
                    <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900">Output Settings</h3>
                    
                    <div>
                        <label for="format" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Output Format</label>
                        <select id="format" class="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                            <option value="jpeg">JPEG</option>
                            <option value="png">PNG</option>
                            <option value="webp">WebP</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>

                    <div>
                        <label for="quality" class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Quality (<span id="qualityValue">85</span>%)</label>
                        <input type="range" id="quality" min="1" max="100" value="85" class="w-full h-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="previewContainer" class="text-center mb-6">
                <h3 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-4">Preview</h3>
                <canvas id="previewCanvas" class="border border-gray-200 rounded-lg max-w-full mx-auto"></canvas>
                <div id="imageInfo" class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500"></div>
            </div>

            <div id="actionButtons" class="flex justify-center gap-4 hidden">
                <button id="resetBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-gray-300">
                    Reset
                </button>
                <button id="downloadBtn" class="px-6 py-3 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-indigo-700">
                    Download Image
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <footer class="text-center mt-16 text-gray-500 text-sm">
            <p>Optimized image processing with ImageTool Pro - Your complete image solution</p>
        </footer>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const dropArea = document.getElementById('dropArea');
            const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
            const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
            const previewContainer = document.getElementById('previewContainer');
            const previewCanvas = document.getElementById('previewCanvas');
            const imageInfo = document.getElementById('imageInfo');
            const widthInput = document.getElementById('width');
            const heightInput = document.getElementById('height');
            const formatSelect = document.getElementById('format');
            const qualitySlider = document.getElementById('quality');
            const qualityValue = document.getElementById('qualityValue');
            const downloadBtn = document.getElementById('downloadBtn');
            const resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
            const keepAspectBtn = document.getElementById('keepAspectRatio');
            const removeAspectBtn = document.getElementById('removeAspectRatio');
            const actionButtons = document.getElementById('actionButtons');

            let originalImage = null;
            let originalAspectRatio = 1;
            let keepAspectRatio = true;

            // Handle drag and drop events
            dropArea.addEventListener('click', () => fileInput.click());
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.add('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
            });
            dropArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                dropArea.classList.remove('active');
                if (e.dataTransfer.files.length) {
                    fileInput.files = e.dataTransfer.files;
                    handleFileSelection();
                }
            });

            fileInput.addEventListener('change', handleFileSelection);

            function handleFileSelection() {
                const file = fileInput.files[0];
                if (!file || !file.type.match('image.*')) return;

                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    originalImage = new Image();
                    originalImage.onload = function() {
                        originalAspectRatio = originalImage.width / originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Initialize inputs
                        widthInput.value = originalImage.width;
                        heightInput.value = originalImage.height;
                        
                        // Show controls
                        controls.classList.remove('hidden');
                        previewContainer.style.display = 'block';
                        actionButtons.classList.remove('hidden');
                        
                        // Update preview
                        updatePreview();
                    };
                    originalImage.src = e.target.result;
                };
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }

            // Update preview when inputs change
            [widthInput, heightInput, formatSelect, qualitySlider].forEach(input => {
                input.addEventListener('input', updatePreview);
            });

            qualitySlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
                qualityValue.textContent = qualitySlider.value;
            });

            // Aspect ratio buttons
            keepAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = true;
                this.classList.add('active');
                removeAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
                updatePreview();
            });

            removeAspectBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                keepAspectRatio = false;
                this.classList.add('active');
                keepAspectBtn.classList.remove('active');
            });

            // Handle width/height changes while maintaining aspect ratio
            widthInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    heightInput.value = Math.round(widthInput.value / originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            heightInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (keepAspectRatio) {
                    widthInput.value = Math.round(heightInput.value * originalAspectRatio);
                    updatePreview();
                }
            });

            function updatePreview() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const width = parseInt(widthInput.value) || 1;
                const height = parseInt(heightInput.value) || 1;
                
                previewCanvas.width = width;
                previewCanvas.height = height;
                
                const ctx = previewCanvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, width, height);
                
                // Update image info
                const format = formatSelect.value.toUpperCase();
                imageInfo.textContent = `${width} Ã— ${height}px â€¢ ${format} â€¢ ${qualitySlider.value}% quality`;
            }

            // Download button
            downloadBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!originalImage) return;
                
                const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
                canvas.width = parseInt(widthInput.value);
                canvas.height = parseInt(heightInput.value);
                
                const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
                ctx.drawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
                
                let mimeType;
                switch(formatSelect.value) {
                    case 'jpeg':
                        mimeType = 'image/jpeg';
                        break;
                    case 'png':
                        mimeType = 'image/png';
                        break;
                    case 'webp':
                        mimeType = 'image/webp';
                        break;
                }
                
                const quality = parseInt(qualitySlider.value) / 100;
                const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL(mimeType, quality);
                
                const link = document.createElement('a');
                link.download = `resized-image.${formatSelect.value}`;
                link.href = dataUrl;
                link.click();
            });

            // Reset button
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                fileInput.value = '';
                previewContainer.style.display = 'none';
                controls.classList.add('hidden');
                actionButtons.classList.add('hidden');
                originalImage = null;
                dropArea.classList.remove('hidden');
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
